title: Bonanza 45 Silent Thunder (1960) Full Length Western

sources.title: Bonanza 45 Silent Thunder (1960) Full Length Western
sources.description:
A deaf girl (Stella Stevens) is treated badly by her father and Joe decides to help her by teaching her sign language. The girl misunderstands Joe's actions as gestures of love.
 
Director: Robert Altman
Writer: John Furia Jr.
Stars: Michael Landon, Lorne Greene, Pernell Roberts
Genres: Classics, Cult, TV, Western
